full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHRIN LAS KYI RNAM BZHAG BLO GSAL 'JUG NGOGS RIN CHEN THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг):
@040A *, ,(CES 'PHRIN LAS KYI RNAM BZHAG BLO GSAL 'JUG NGOGS RIN CHEN THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RJE BTZUN DAM PA DMIGS PA MED PA'I THUGS RJE'I GTER CHEN POR GYUR BA MTSUNGS MED BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I GSUNG RAB SNGA PHYI PHAL CHER LA 'DRIS PAR BYAS ZHING, GSUNGS BSGRO LA GZHIR BYAS TE, LEGS BSHAD DON GNYER GYI BLO GSAR 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN CHED DANG, RANG NYID KYANG BAG CHAGS BZHAG PA'I PHYIR DU, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BKRA
SHIS KYIS, 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA'I GAR NA SA RIGS GROL GYI YON TAN RGYAD DANG LDAN PA'I MKHAS GRUB MANG PO'I 'DUG NAS PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA, DGE LDAN BSHAD SGRUB DAR RGYAS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL BA'I GLING NAS SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, RGYAL YUM DGONGS 'GREL BCAS PA MA LUS LAS, ,RGYAL BA'I 'PHRIN LAS JI SNYED @040B GSUNG BA RNAMS, ,RGYAL TSAB GNYIS PA'I LEGS BSHAD 'DI NANG DU, , RGYAL BA'I YE SHES SGYU 'PHRUL JI BZHIN STON, ,GZHUNG 'DI PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I BKA' DRIN YANG, ,CHING DBANG DBANG PHYUG AER KHE SHAR BYUNG, ,LHAG BSAM RNAM DKAR GA BUR ZEGS MA LAGS, ,DO DAM BKA' BCU BLO BZANG CHOS SKYONGS SOGS, , YIG MKHAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DON GRUB DANG, ,SGOS KYI RIGS BYED GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO'O, ,DGE 'DIS MI DBANG YAB YUM SRAS BCAS SOGS, ,BAR CHAD KUN ZHI SKU TSE MNGA' THAR RGYAS, ,THEG MCHOG BSHES KYIS BRTZE BAS RJES BZUNG STE, , THEG CHEN ZUNG 'BREL LAM BZANG RIM BGROD NAS, ,THEG PA'I MTHA' THAG BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB STE, ,THEG CHEN GDAMS PAS 'GRO KUN 'DREN PAR SHOG ,
